mapper.insert: insert into tbl_post ( post_no, account, genre_id, ca_id, platform_id, post_title, post_writer, publish_status, publish_cycle, ep_id, cur_ep, total_ep, star_rate ) VALUES ( seq_tbl_post.nextval, #{account}, #{genreId}, #{caId}, #{platformId}, #{postTitle}, #{postWriter}, #{publishStatus}, #{publishCycle}, #{epId}, #{curEp}, #{totalEp}, #{starRate} )
mapper.select: SELECT post_no, account, genre_id, ca_id, platform_id, post_title, post_writer, publish_status, publish_cycle, ep_id, cur_ep, total_ep, reg_date, update_date, star_rate FROM tbl_post

SELECT p.post_no, p.account, p.genre_id, g.genre_name, p.ca_id, p.platform_id, pf.platform_name, pf.platform_bg_color, pf.platform_font_color, p.post_title, p.post_writer, p.publish_status, p.publish_cycle, p.ep_id, p.cur_ep, p.total_ep, p.reg_date, p.update_date, p.star_rate ,pi.file_name FROM tbl_post p
LEFT OUTER JOIN prj_genre g ON p.genre_id = g.genre_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN prj_platform pf ON p.platform_id = pf.platform_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN prj_post_img pi ON p.post_no= pi.post_no where pi.thumbnail = 'true' or pi.thumbnail is null

SELECT post_no, account, genre_id, ca_id, platform_id, post_title, post_writer, publish_status, publish_cycle, ep_id, cur_ep, total_ep, reg_date, update_date, star_rate FROM tbl_post WHERE post_no = #{postNo}

SELECT p.post_no, p.account, p.genre_id, g.genre_name, p.ca_id, p.platform_id, pf.platform_name, pf.platform_bg_color, pf.platform_font_color, p.post_title, p.post_writer, p.publish_status, p.publish_cycle, p.ep_id, p.cur_ep, p.total_ep, p.reg_date, p.update_date, p.star_rate FROM tbl_post p LEFT OUTER JOIN prj_genre g ON p.genre_id = g.genre_id LEFT OUTER JOIN prj_platform pf ON p.platform_id = pf.platform_id WHERE post_no = #{postNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_post SET genre_id=#{genreId}, ca_id=#{caId}, platform_id=#{platformId}, post_title=#{postTitle}, post_writer=#{postWriter}, publish_status=#{publishStatus}, publish_cycle=#{publishCycle}, ep_id=#{epId}, cur_ep=#{curEp}, total_ep=#{totalEp}, update_date = SYSDATE, star_rate=#{starRate} WHERE post_no = #{postNo}
